p: African green monkey kidney Vero E6 cell line was obtained from Istituto Zooprofilattico Sperimentale (Brescia, Italy) and maintained in Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle Medium (DMEM; Gibco, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS; Gibco, ThermoFisher Scientific) at 37 °C in a humidified atmosphere of 5% CO 2.
